item.description: JEWISH? SINGLE? 45-65? This Dec 25th, dare to go "BEYOND CHINESE FOOD & A MOVIE"! Join us for a unique, stimulating, fun and ***GENDER BALANCED*** evening at a COOL VENUE in BROOKLINE! PLEASE NOTE: YOU MUST REGISTER ON THE WEBSITE www.bresler.us SORRY- NO WALK-INS CAN BE ACCOMODATED. REGISTRATION HERE does **not hold your spot** For full details and/or questions, please contact KEN BRESLER via the website above. $18 admission fee is payable to the organizer & includes great FOOD (not Chinese! :)
item.name: "BEYOND CHINESE FOOD & A MOVIE": Not your average Dec 25th Jewish Singles Event!
